name: Minion Siege
description:
Minion Siege is an Android Tower Defense Game based on the characters and universe from League of Legends. Please note that the game is in Pt-Br, so follow the instructions below and thanks for playing <3

PLEASE READ THESE INSCTRUCTIONS:

- Tap the "Sword" icons in the game to open the Turret menu (there you can choose which character to deploy);

- To remove a turret from a spot just tap on it and hold for one second.

- You CAN NOT deploy any turrets once the wave has started so you have to plan your team before tapping the button to start the wave;

- You start the wave by tapping on the red circle with a minion's face on it;

- Double Tapping a deployed Jinx will switch between her two attacks (Fishbones and Pow Pow);

- I believe that covers everything you need to know before you play! Enjoy the game.
